about_the_game:
This is the battle background formatted for the SRPG Studio with a size of 840 x 480.
The following files are contained.
(This DLC also includes 1680 × 960 files.)

1. celestial_cliff(shrine)
2. celestial_corridor
3. celestial_field
4. celestial_forest
5. celestial_fountain
6. celestial_hill
7. celestial_road
8. celestial_temple_remains
9. celestial_waterfall
10.warpzone

The terms of use of materials are as below:

1. Materials can be used, not only for the game created with the SRPG Studio.
They can also be used in paid games.
2. Materials can be used and processed.
3. The author's copyright of the materials belongs to SapphireSoft.
However, when you use the materials, you are not required to mention it.
4. The sales of the materials are prohibited. The sales of the processed materials are also prohibited.
5. The distribution of the materials is prohibited. The distribution of the processed materials is also prohibited.
6. Materials can be used in age-restricted games.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® Vista(sp2) / 7 / 8 / 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: Background images that can be used in celestial realm games.
